Package com.bdowebtech.bargainbuyclub

Class EventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bdowebtech.bargainbuyclub.EventHandler
  • public class EventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    EventHandler class executes actions requested by users.
    Author:
    Martin Dwyer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EventHandler()
      Default constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAlert​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method processes information submitted for new alert.
      void adminDisplayAlerts​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method retrieves all system alerts for admin users as requested.
      void deleteAlert​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method deletes alerts as requested by the user.
      void deleteUser​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method deletes users as requested by validated administrators.
      void displayAlerts​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method used to forward validated user to their display alerts page.
      void displayNewAlertPage​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method forwards current user to addAlert page for entering new alert information.
      void displayUsersForAdmin​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method prepares and presents all users when selected by validated administrators.
      void editAlert​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method edits alert information as requested by users.
      void editUser​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method edits user information as requested by validated administrators.
      void goHome​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method terminates the active session and returns user to home page.
      java.util.ArrayList<Alert> loadHome()
      Method is used to obtain alert objects for the home page illustration.
      void loginUser​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method processes login username and password request and forwards users to their individual alerts page after user validation.
      void logoutUser​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method logs out user and returns the user to the home page.
      void makeUserAdmin​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method gives users administrator privileges as requested by validated administrators.
      void registerUser​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method processes a registration request and forwards a new user to the display alerts page unless email is already registered.
